user_input:
Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Hydrogen as the complement not the carrier
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. Do not access any PLEXOS database; use functions to operate on external data files and generate required outputs.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 study using scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050]. Split the nodes. Use Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier). Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050]; split the nodes; set Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', generate the hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand datasets (with node-level splitting) for the specified scenarios and years, treating Hydrogen as the complement and without accessing any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Export the generated Hybrid Heat Pump hourly demand profiles to the TYNDP standard tst format (carrier='Hybrid Heat Pump').
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', export the outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' into TYNDP 2026 tst workbooks for all specified scenarios and years.
